content: NEW YORK  Oct 18 Prospects for steep U.S. tax cuts are raising the ceiling for already-frothy shares of Wall Street-favorite Align Technology Inc even as patents expire for some of the technology that has helped its braces gain favor with orthodontists.
name: Align Technology Inc
title: Lofty Align Tech shares may rise more on U.S. tax cut  index inclusion
